ComicInfo.Summary:
Events from the past converge with the present as Lady Mechanika begins to unravel the mystery of La Madrina. But will she prove to be a useful ally, or a dangerous foe? Features a main story by guest artist Brian Ching (Supergirl, Star Wars) and a prologue story drawn by Joe Benitez and Martin Montiel.
